text: Ra yadi ti duvaile timiharumathi yasakurako dabava dinchan, ki timile kasaila'i mero sathama sajhidara thahara'u jasako timila'i jnana chaina, ta uniharuko kura namannu ra sansarika kamaharuma uniharuko ramro satha dinu, ra juna vyakti matira pravrtta huncha, usako margama hindnu. Ra timi sabaila'i matira pharki a'unu cha. Ani juna kama timi garirakheka hunchau, ma timila'i sabai bata'unechu
